uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.mechanism

Class RMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.tools.EBIMatrix
      • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.mechanism.RMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class RMatrix
extends EBIMatrix
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class create the RMatrix of a reaction according to the DU-Theory. (I.Ugi et al., J. Chem. Inf. Comput. Sci. 1994, 34, 3-16).
    Author:
    Syed Asad Rahman , Lorenzo Baldacci {lorenzo@ebi.ac.uk|lbaldacc@csr.unibo.it}
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • RMatrix

        public RMatrix(BEMatrix reactantBE,
               BEMatrix productBE,
               AtomAtomMappingContainer mapping)
        throws org.openscience.cdk.exception.CDKException
        Class constructor. Generates the RMatrix of a reaction given the BEMatrices of Reactants and Products.
        Parameters:
        reactantBE - Reactants BEMatrix
        productBE - Products BEMatrix
        mapping - Atom-Atom mappings between reactant and products atoms
        Throws:
        org.openscience.cdk.exception.CDKException
